alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 1:37PM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. 3 to 6 inches expected between 6000 and 7000 feet. Up to 15 inches possible near the peaks. Wind gusts as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause visibility restrictions in blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham
